conditionsPopup.title: Mission Request
conditionsPopup.description:
The manager can assign a mission to the employee at any time deemed appropriate.

If the employee wishes to request a mission, the request must be submitted at least one day in advance and before 2:00 PM.

halfDay.title: Half-Day Mission
rules: The employee attends a half workday at their regular location.
They must clock in and out as usual.

fullDay.title: Full-Day Mission
rules: The employee spends the entire day on the mission outside the workplace.
They are not required to clock in or out on that day.
